name: Clockwork Lord
description:
Use time based abilities to defeat the endless hordes of enemies!

But beware even your time will run out.

This game was made for the  Mini Jam 23 with the theme TIME.

The limitation was to only use 4 colors.

Controls 

Move: WASD or left thumbstick

Aim: mouse or right thumbstick

Shoot: left click or right shoulder button (R1)

Strong shot: right click or left shoulder button (L1) 

Time bubble: space or left trigger (L2)

Upgrade menu: R or face button top (triangle)

Controller menu: face button bottom (X) to confirm / D-pad to navigate
